The Tableau certification course offered by the University of California, Davis on Coursera that impart skills in data visualization using Tableau. The certification comprises of 5 courses as follows:

-   Fundamentals of Visualization with Tableau.
-   Essential Design Principles for Tableau.
-   Visual Analytics with Tableau.
-   Creating Dashboards and Storytelling with Tableau.
-   Data Visualization with Tableau Project.

My final certificate is available on this [link](https://www.coursera.org/account/accomplishments/verify/CA9P6ZDETNJH?utm_source=link&utm_medium=certificate&utm_content=cert_image&utm_campaign=sharing_cta&utm_product=course) <https://www.coursera.org/account/accomplishments/verify/CA9P6ZDETNJH?utm_source=link&utm_medium=certificate&utm_content=cert_image&utm_campaign=sharing_cta&utm_product=course>
